title: At the foothills
text: You've arrived at the foothills of a mountain, its not going to be easy hiking from here on out.

title: At the foothills
text: Thinking better of it you turn back the way you came.

title: The climb
text: Climbing is difficult work! It will take all of your strength to make it to the top

results.text: While attempting to climb a rock wall your strength fails you and you plumit to the ground, OWWWCH!
The climb is difficult but not impossible, and you make steady progress.

title: Defeat
text: Nursing your injuries you retreat back the way you came. The mountain has defeated you.

title: Success
text: Breathing heavily in the thin air you emerge at the summit, the view is spectacular!
